CCL,Stinking Carnival cruise ship being towed to Alabama * Carnival Corp expects ship at port no later than Thursday 
SCHW,Stock trading rose in January at U.S. online brokers NEW YORK, Feb 12 Online brokers this week reported higher daily trading volume for January as people who sold businesses, properties and investments late last year to escape higher 2013 taxes began putting their cash to work. 
C,Citi unit sells half of Aeromexico stake, Mexican group buys MEXICO CITY, Feb 12 Aeromexico said on Tuesday that a group of local businessmen, led by Eduardo Tricio Haro, had bought a 20.19 percent stake in the Mexican airline. 
CME,CME Group does not want to go private 'at this time,' CEO says CHICAGO, Feb 12 CME Group's chief executive on Tuesday shot down the possibility that the giant futures exchange operator will go private any time soon, a day after it was revealed that Nasdaq OMX Group had discussed such a move.

column2: Judge denies Wells Fargo attempt to fight financial crisis suit WASHINGTON
column3: Feb 12 A federal judge on Tuesday denied Wells Fargo's attempt to beat back a financial-crisis lawsuit by arguing it conflicted with an earlier settlement.
